Python API Automation Framework
Hybrid Custom API Automation Framework include the proper folder structure.

https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/1409610/354955159-3c7d5fe5-207a-42e7-84fe-f4d53354d987.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..5pt4lkKs3wg6XE7w44b7Q6bdrYiQzQNegm_4WRilLUw

Tech Stack

Python 3.13
Requests - HTTP Requests
PyTest - Testing Framework
Reporting - Allure Report, PyTest HTML
Test Data - CSV, Excel
Parallel Execution - x distribute (xdist)
Advance API Testcase - jsonschema
How to Install Packages

pip install requests pytest pytest-html faker allure-pytest jsonschema
How to run your Testcase Parallel pip install pytest-xdist 

How to run the Basic Test with Allure report

 pytest tests/tests/crud/test_create_booking.py  --alluredir=allure_result -s
